item.description:
Dear All,

I am obviously new to this .. event location included within...
:P

I am organizing a town hall meeting on Monday October 18th from
7:30 pm to 9:00 pm.
I have requested the attendance of Mark Zaccaria and Jim
Langevin so that constituents of RI's 2nd Congressional
District can meet and ask questions of the candidates. I wanted
to share that Mark graciously accepted. Jim, on the other hand,
has not responded to my emails.
Please call Jim Langevin's office and headquarters to request
his attendance at this event. His headquarters phone number is
(401) 737-7177 and his email is jim@jimlangevin.com.
If you hesitate because you think someone else has already done
so, remember that there is strength in numbers.

Event: Town Hall with RI Candidates for Congressional District
2
Time - 7:30 pm to 9:00 pm
Place: Warwick Public Library
600 Sandy Lane
Warwick, RI 02889
401 739-5440
Thanks and I look forward to meeting you all on the 18th!!
Best,
Cathleen Griffeth
401 626 4744
item.name: "Town Hall - Congressional District 2 October 18th from 7:30 pm to 9:00 pm"
